summary:
Did you ever wondered that the guards have coloured armors and shields, but no suited swords? Well, now they have!
Little Extra: New Imperial Sword-Retexture included
descriptionHtml:
Did you ever wondered that the guards e.g. in Whiterun DO have coloured armors and shields, but DON\'T have suited weapons, swords or something like that?!

So what does this mod?
 This mod adds these swords!
The Mod adds:
Guardsword of Eastmarch (Optional File: Eastmarch Guard\'s Sword)
Guardsword of Falkreath (Optional File: Falkreath Guard\'s Sword)
Guardsword of Hjaalmarch (Optional File: Hjaalmarch Guard\'s Sword)
Guardsword of Markarth (Optional File: Markarth Guard\'s Sword)
Guardsword of Pale (Optional File: Pale Guard\'s Sword)
Guardsword of Riften (Optional File: Riften Guard\'s Sword)
Guardsword of Solitude(Optional File: Solitude Guard\'s Sword)
Guardsword of Whiterun (Optional File: Whiterun Guard\'s Sword)
Guardsword of Winterhold (Optional File: Winterhold Guard\'s Sword)
Replacement for Imperial Sword
 The swords are balanced and they just look great. Every Guard, which is a guard from a hold, gets the suited sword with the suited colours and logos.
 Finally, there is a reason to use the Imperial Swords, which are really ugly in the vanilla-game. 
Extra: New Imperial Sword-Retexture by me included for a much more...well...imperial style.

!I\'m Not updating this Mod anymore!
Bugs: -The guards who carry the swords are in german. I will fix this soon.
         - because of The Imperial-mark on the swords, the swords are looking in-game different as 
           on my screenshots. Soon, i will bring out a version without  the hold-logo over this imperial-
           mark.

You can post wishes for another retexturation or coloration mods in the Comments.
I will be pleased of you add more Screenshots!
That is just my third mod now, so be kindly!
If you want an equal to this mod just with BOWs, then look here: :http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34409
If you want an equal to this mod just with DAGGERS, then look here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34426
IF YOU WANT A COMPILATION OF MY 3 GUARD WEAPONS MODS, then look here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34470

installation: uninstall earlier versions
                   copy all files into the skyrim/data direction

Please Endorse, if you like it!
author: GGinddi
